I like it just for the scripting and it: or u can still use kate in gnome
kate kdelibs-bin kdelibs-data kdelibs4c2a libarts1c2a libavahi-qt3-1  libopenexr2c2a menu-xdg
thats all i need to install it.
After unpacking 63.1MB of additional disk space will be used.
